channel.title: Pages on DafuZhu
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on DafuZhu

item.title: About
item.description: Writing conventions Each project is named following the format: [organization]-[project name]#[project number].md For self-initiated projects, I use “self” as the organization name. Math syntax Display math: \[ \] or $$ $$; inline math: \( \) e.g. For \(i=1,\cdots,l\) $$ \omega^{(i)}_n\leftarrow \omega^{(i)}_{n-1}-\alpha\cdot \nabla_{\omega^{(i)}}L(\omega^{(1)}_{n-1},\cdots,\omega^{(l)}_{n-1}) $$
